item.title: About
item.description: Webpresence of Prashant Tak Why should a man climb Everest? Because it is there. -Meredith Edwards, The conquest of Everest Hi! I’m Prashant. This is something experimental for me, the entire “blog” experience. I’ve never been someone who can openly share their thoughts so this might not end up being a personal blog and just a random collection of articles and notes but that’s something which will be decided in the future.
